nodes.text: Chocolate Popcorn with Crait Red Salt

Chocolate Popcorn with Crait Red Salt was a form of popped Surabat grain served at Kat Saka's Kettle in Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. The kernels were mixed with chocolate and sprinkled with red salt from Crait, an uninhabited mineral world.

This popcorn is available exclusively at Kat Saka's Kettle in Disneyland's Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was introduced in October 2019 along with other new foods that were not available when the park debuted. The menu description is, "Chocolate kettle corn sprinkled with red salt."
